document_data.name: Emperor's Quarters
document_data.mainbody: The '''Emperor's Quarters''' served as the palace of the [[Emperor of the Lotus Throne]] in the [[Yikarian Empire]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{Cite dragon/241/Campaign Classics: The Roof of the World}}
document_data.Location: The Emperor's Quarters made-up a a full quarter of the size of the capital city of [[Nathong]].
document_data.Description: Since [[yak-folk]] cities resembled large buildings compared to the traditional layout of most cities found on [[Toril]], the Emperor's Quarters was actually just a large chunk of the city as a whole. Thousands of [[dwarven]] slaves toiled to enhance the beauty of that area of the city and display the Emperor's wealth.
